# currentMemoryUsage

**Instance Property**

The current size of the in-memory cache, in bytes.

## Declaration

```swift
var currentMemoryUsage: Int { get }
```

## Getting and setting in-memory cache properties

- **memoryCapacity**: The capacity of the in-memory cache, in bytes.
